content:
WebScriptEndpointElement Class

In this Article

Represents a custom configuration element that defines a WebScriptEndpoint in a configuration file.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WebScriptEndpointElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardEndpointElement
  • WebScriptEndpointElement

Remarks

Web scripting enables working with the data entered onto a web page.

Constructors summary

WebScriptEndpointElement()

Initiates a new instance of the WebScriptEndpointElement class.

Properties summary

ContentTypeMapper

Gets or sets the name of the group of behaviors and metadata that produce the web document configured by the current WebScriptEndpointElement.
CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled

Gets or sets whether different host computers can access each othersâ€™ scripts.
EndpointType

Gets the type of the WebScriptEndpoint.
HostNameComparisonMode

Specifies how the host name should be used in URI comparisons when dispatching an incoming message to a WebScriptEndpoint.
MaxBufferPoolSize

Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of any buffer pools used by the message transport.
MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to receive messages.
MaxReceivedMessageSize

Gets or sets the maximum byte size of messages received by a WebScriptEndpoint.
Properties

Gets all the properties attached to the current WebScriptEndpoint.
ReaderQuotas

Gets a configuration element that defines the constraints on the complexity of messages that can be processed by WebScriptEndpoint objects.
Security

Gets an HTTP web security binding element.
TransferMode

Gets or sets the manner in which WCF messages are transported.
WriteEncoding

Gets or sets the encoding that is used to format the characters in a text message.

Methods summary

CreateServiceEndpoint(ContractDescription)

Initiates a new WebScriptEndpoint with the specified ContractDescription.
OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ChannelEndpointElement)

Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebScriptEndpoint.
OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ServiceEndpointElement)

Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebScriptEndpoint.
OnInitializeAndValidate(ChannelEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of the specified ChannelEndpointElement and configures it to include web HTTP binding content.
OnInitializeAndValidate(ServiceEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of the specified ServiceEndpointElement and configures it to include web HTTP binding content.

Constructors

  • WebScriptEndpointElement()

    Initiates a new instance of the WebScriptEndpointElement class.

    public WebScriptEndpointElement ();

Properties

  • ContentTypeMapper

    Gets or sets the name of the group of behaviors and metadata that produce the web document configured by the current WebScriptEndpointElement.

    public string ContentTypeMapper { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of a content type.

  • CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled

    Gets or sets whether different host computers can access each othersâ€™ scripts.

    public bool CrossDomainScriptAccessEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if cross domain script access is enabled; otherwise, false.

  • EndpointType

    Gets the type of the WebScriptEndpoint.

    protected override Type EndpointType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      An web script endpoint object.

  • HostNameComparisonMode

    Specifies how the host name should be used in URI comparisons when dispatching an incoming message to a WebScriptEndpoint.

    public System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • HostNameComparisonMode

      An enumerated description of a comparison mode.

    Remarks

    Comparison mode settings refer to the StrongWildcard, Exact, and WeakWildcard descriptions.

  • MaxBufferPoolSize

    Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of any buffer pools used by the message transport.

    public long MaxBufferPoolSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The maximum buffer pool size.

  • MaxBufferSize

    Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to receive messages.

    public int MaxBufferSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The maximum buffer size.

  • MaxReceivedMessageSize

    Gets or sets the maximum byte size of messages received by a WebScriptEndpoint.

    public long MaxReceivedMessageSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The maximum byte size.

  • Properties

    Gets all the properties attached to the current WebScriptEndpoint.

    protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }

    Property Value

    • ConfigurationPropertyCollection

      A collection of endpoint element properties.

  • ReaderQuotas

    Gets a configuration element that defines the constraints on the complexity of messages that can be processed by WebScriptEndpoint objects.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement ReaderQuotas { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement

      A configuration element that defines Xml dictionary reader quotas.

  • Security

    Gets an HTTP web security binding element.

    public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement Security { get; }

    Property Value

    • WebHttpSecurityElement

      A web script endpoint configuration element.

  • TransferMode

    Gets or sets the manner in which WCF messages are transported.

    public System.ServiceModel.TransferMode TransferMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TransferMode

      An object that contains a string that designates a WCF message transfer mode.

    Remarks

    Examples of message transfer types include buffered and streamed.

  • WriteEncoding

    Gets or sets the encoding that is used to format the characters in a text message.

    public System.Text.Encoding WriteEncoding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Encoding

      The character encoding.

Methods

  • CreateServiceEndpoint(ContractDescription)

    Initiates a new WebScriptEndpoint with the specified ContractDescription.

    protected override System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint CreateServiceEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contractDescription);

    Parameters

    • contractDescription
      ContractDescription

      An object whose properties define an endpointâ€™s characteristics, including

      • the signature of the operations in terms of messages exchanged

      • the data types of these messages, the location of the operations

      • the specific protocols and serialization formats that are used to support successful communication with the service

    Returns

    • ServiceEndpoint

      A web script endpoint.

  • OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ChannelEndpointElement)

    Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebScriptEndpoint.

    protected override void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The ServiceEndpoint to convert.

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ChannelEndpointElement

      Not used.

  • OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint,ServiceEndpointElement)

    Converts the specified ServiceEndpoint to a WebScriptEndpoint.

    protected override void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • endpoint
      ServiceEndpoint

      The ServiceEndpoint to convert.

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ServiceEndpointElement

      Not used.

  • OnInitializeAndValidate(ChannelEndpointElement)

    Initializes and verifies the format of the specified ChannelEndpointElement and configures it to include web HTTP binding content.

    protected override void OnInitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • channelEndpointElement
      ChannelEndpointElement

      The ChannelEndpointElement to be initialized.

  • OnInitializeAndValidate(ServiceEndpointElement)

    Initializes and verifies the format of the specified ServiceEndpointElement and configures it to include web HTTP binding content.

    protected override void OnInitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);

    Parameters

    • serviceEndpointElement
      ServiceEndpointElement

      The ServiceEndpointElement to be initialized.
